meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>flavor</kanji> of an <kanji>idea</kanji>, what is that? Imagine yourself licking an idea to figure out what it tastes like. What do you think you'll be tasting? Probably the <vocabulary>meaning</vocabulary> of said idea.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
